metadata.title: CVE-2021-33293 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description:
Panorama Tools libpano13 v2.9.20 was discovered to contain an out-of-bounds read in the function panoParserFindOLine() in parser.c.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-33293` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libpano13-3 - 2.9.21+dfsg-2
libpano13-bin - 2.9.21+dfsg-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libpano13 package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.9.21+dfsg-2').
